product_name: Royal Robbins Promenade Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With roll-up legs, wrinkle resistance and the best of both worlds with cotton and nylon, the women's Royal Robbins Promenade Pants are ready for all your adventure travels. Fabric is 70% cotton for soft breathability and 30% nylon for durable, quick-drying, wrinkle-free performance. UPF 30 sun protection keeps harmful UV rays at bay. Lots of pockets: 2 hand; 1 drop-in for cellphone; 1 zippered; 2 cargo; and 2 rear. Royal Robbins Promenade Pants have tabs that secure rolled-up legs. Closeout.
short_description: With roll-up legs, wrinkle resistance and the best of both worlds with cotton and nylon, the women's Royal Robbins Promenade Pants are ready for all your adventure travels.
